snippet: Mayor Bill de Blasio, who like many other city employees has been battling a bug, canceled public appearances.
abstract: New York City government is disrupted as Mayor Bill de Blasio takes sick day.
lead_paragraph: Mayor Bill de Blasio, who like many other city employees has been battling a bug, canceled public appearances.

headline.main: De Blasio, Sipping Tea, Has to Take a Sick Day
headline.print_headline: De Blasio, Sipping Tea, Has to Take a Sick Day
